Row.Text: A defensible district.[NEWLINE]+3[ICON_Tourism] Tourism with Conservation.
+{1_num} [ICON_Culture] Culture from the adjacent Theater district.
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] Gold from the adjacent Commercial Hub district.
+{1_num} [ICON_Faith] Faith from the adjacent Holy Site district.
+{1_num} [ICON_Science] Science from the adjacent Campus district.
+20% Growth in city to rebound from disasters.[NEWLINE]Also provides immunity from minor disasters.[NEWLINE]In Zombie Defense mode Zombie Outbreak spy missions are less effective.
Allows the special project Turn Undead II to levy zombies.
Provies a line of defense for the Walled Quarter.
Upon completion, gain control of the zombies currently in this city's territory. Control lasts 45 turns.
